en.title: Do you find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho | safe }}?
en.mustBeIntolerable: You must find it intolerable (unbearable) to live with your {{ case.divorceWho | safe }} to use adultery as your reason for divorce. This applies whether you're still living together or not.

errors.required: Select yes if you find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho | safe}}
